thread.title: Jenni 'JWoww' Farley pregnant with second child
thread.title_full: Jenni 'JWoww' Farley pregnant with second child - UPI.com

author: Annie Martin
title: Jenni 'JWoww' Farley pregnant with second child
text:
1 of 5 | License Photo TOMS RIVER, N.J., Oct. 20 (UPI) -- Jenni "JWoww" Farley and husband Roger Matthews are expecting their second child.
The 29-year-old former Jersey Shore star confirmed as much on her website Monday, the day after her wedding to Matthews . The couple announced the news to their family and friends at the ceremony Sunday.
"It's true, we are expecting baby number two!" Farley wrote. "All I know this was was the hardest secret to ever keep!! We are so excited to share it with you guys, though ... So yes, Meilani is going to be a big sister and we are due in May 2016!"
"Baby No. 2 is official!" she added in a statement to Us Weekly magazine. "A wedding that was beyond a dream come true and baby No. 2 on the way, we couldn't ask for more. We are on cloud nine!"
Farley and Matthews have been together since 2010, and married with the television personality's former co-stars, including Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi and Sammi "Sweetheart" Giancola, in attendance. The couple welcomed their daughter Meilani in July 2014.
Jenni 'JWoww' Farley and Roger Matthews announced they are expecting their second child at their wedding Sunday. Instagram /Jenni Farley Farley was a main cast member on all six seasons of Jersey Shore , and went on to star on four seasons of spinoff Snooki & JWoww with Polizzi. She has also appeared on the series Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars and Worst Cooks in America: Celebrity Edition .
